name: Modbus XML Schema
tagline: Modbus XML Schema Definition and utility software
body: This project describes the eXtended Markup Language (XML) Schema definition (XSD) for interoperability of Modbus devices using a common and expressive set of XML elements to describe their input and output functions. The goal of the proposed technology is to facilitate the rapid, cost-effective retrofit integration of building automation systems by exposing the functions of sensors, actuators, and other data sources through a uniform software interface
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
